FuncDef:
The dldp work-mode command configures a DLDP working mode.
The undo dldp work-mode command restores the default mode. The dldp work-mode command configures a DLDP working mode. The undo dldp work-mode command restores the default mode. By default, DLDP works in the enhanced mode.

ParaDef.Info:

ExtraInfo:
A unidirectional link occurs for either of two reasons. One reason is that the fibers are cross connected. The other is that either fiber in a pair is disconnected or broken. The dldp work-mode command configures a working mode in which DLDP operates to detect a specific type of unidirectional link.
